Summary: Chocolate icon and information about coin are absent on the 'Camp Choc' Pop-Up

Summary.1: User has enough coin to upgrade Camp Choc building
Summary.2: Camp Choc building has premaximum building level

Steps to reproduce.4: Wait till the building is upgraded
Steps to reproduce.5: Pay attention to the 'Camp Choc' Pop-Up

Actual result: Empty icon (without chocolate picture) and empty button are displayed on the 'Camp Choc' Pop-Up after upgrading the building to the maximum level
Expected result: All information and pictures should present on the 'Camp Choc' Pop-Up after upgrading the building to the maximum level

Summary: The price of items aren't displayed in the cart after adding it to the cart

Steps to reproduce.1: Choose the 'Microwave' (example, also you can choose any sector) sector on the left side of the site on the main screen
Steps to reproduce.4: Click on the cart icon on the top panel of the site
Steps to reproduce.5: Pay attention to the price information on the 'Cart' screen

Actual result: The price of the microwave isn't displayed on the 'Cart' screen after adding the microwave to the cart
Expected result: The price is shown on the 'Cart' screen and corresponds to the price from the items page

Summary: Page with error message opens after clicking on the logo on the main screen

Steps to reproduce.2: Pay attention to the opened page

Actual result: 'The page with the 'Error address' message appears on the new tab after clicking on the logo of the company on the main screen
Expected result: Main page is restarted after clicking on the company logo
